alert.note: Alert for Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 06 at 1:38PM MST until May 08 at 11:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 11 PM SUNDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Arizona, southeast California and south central and southern Nevada. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 11 PM Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Difficult driving conditions are possible, especially in high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Patchy blowing dust may impact travel at times.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
